ModMetaData.name: Boots and Stuff[1.1]
ModMetaData.author: Techmago
ModMetaData.description:
Simple mod that adds boots and gloves to Rimworld.
Tired of having your colonists wearing expensive hyperwave cloths, and walking around barefoot? Squirrels keep biting off you fingers? Protect yourself!
#Features
==== Footwear: Sandals: Sandals will give you almost no protection from damage or cold, but they will make you fast and help in hot biomes. MoveSpeed +40% No armor
Boots: Boots give you the most protection, but are hot and heavier MoveSpeed +30% Light armor
Military Boots: Tought armored boots. MoveSpeed +20% Armored
Shoes: Shoes are more expensive, worth more, and are more balanced. MoveSpeed +30% Really Light armor
==== Hand-wear: Work gloves: Protect your hands, so you can work faster! WorkSpeedGlobal +5%
Mining gloves: tick gloves. Good for mining and building, but uncorfortable for medics. They also offers more protection. MiningSpeed +15% ConstructionSpeed +15% ConstructSuccessChance +15% MedicalTendQuality -5% MedicalTendSpeed -10% MedicalSurgerySuccessChance -5% MedicalOperationSpeed -10%
Medic gloves: Thin gloves with limited lifespan. They do assist in medical operations. MedicalTendQuality +5% MedicalTendSpeed +10% MedicalSurgerySuccessChance +5% MedicalOperationSpeed +10%
==== Rings: Rings are expensive and hard to make, but they give social impact and worth a lot. NegotiationAbility +10% SocialImpact +10%
Note: Only bionic arms and no hads for rings? try this: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1528295006
